post.body: No, I missed it! re: Secret Millionaire. I need setup Tivo to record it.
don't need to test a GT-R. Currently own the world's fastest. :-) http://tinyurl.com/5b44jc
have a doggie door. The dogs come and go when they want. Inside it goes into a pen I can close off from the rest of the house
that's so ridiculous. You should have your dog poop on all their doorsteps and leave an anonymous Christmas card. :)
I drove from Florida to Toronto and back one winter. Went by Niagara Falls. It's an amazing sight.
don't joke about spiders. that was the worst night ever when I kept waking up because one spider just bit me all night.
I'm going to Japan for Tokyo Auto Salon.
I haven't decided yet. I'm heading to Japan soon but haven't decided where to spend NYE yet. Why South Africa?
haha, yes, that's a funny picture. Frank's oldest daughter only refers to me as "Uncle Monkey" (seriously)
LCD is good, thanks :)
the site will probably open in February when the shop has its Grand Opening.
the gearbox exploded at the track: http://tinyurl.com/9otqog
I really need 2 more GT-Rs. One for a daily driver and the other to take parts from. :)
thanks for sending me the Flying Monkey. Love that sucker! I hate to fight to stop one of my employees from taking it home!
no payment plan at this time.
Very cool! Are you in the UK?
Oh Yes. Uncle Johnny was quite popular after little Jack got his dinosaur for Christmas. :)
brother Andy, you just know there will be a retaliation for that against me from @masscontrolkern.
the GT-R currently has a blown gearbox that we're fixing. 370Z looks awesome! Samurai Speed (my new company) might get one.
wow that auction list is OLD. Pretty much abandoned it after moving on to other projects.
we're overhauling our in-house mail system. You can subscribe at the bottom: http://www.marketingsecrets.com/newsletter.html
very nice! my parents have made many trips to the Ozarks. They rave about it.
sorry I missed you when you were in FL. I'll probably see you in February when you're back here for @kenmcarthur 's event
what's on my list for today? TONS. Product release at Noon... Need to get organized and prepare for a trip to Japan next week.
it takes 20 gurus to change a lightbulb. 19 to mail their lists telling them all the same thing and 1 to actually change it. :)
Thanks, Shane, appreciate it. I noticed your an Aussie living abroad somewhere. You in the US?
I tried Melatonin once after @masscontrolkern recommended it and I had HORRIBLE NIGHTMARES. I've been afraid to try it again.
Enjoying the wonders of waiting 30+ minutes just to open a new checking account.
Just hit 9,000 followers. Welcome everyone! Now it's bedtime. Nite all!
Finished up "The Dark Knight" on Bluray tonight. There's no way Heath Ledger is not winning an Oscar. Such a shame he passed away.
I love when Betty hangs out in the backyard at 4AM and barks non-stop. I bet my neighbors love me.
Just found out tonight that I'm getting a private tour of the GT-R assembly plant when I visit Japan. WOOT!
Why am I awake at 3:31AM?
Is anyone going on a special trip for New Year's?
A Big 'Welcome' To All My New Followers! :-)
Samurai Speed's YouTube videos are already over 60,000 views. Not bad for very little marketing. Just goes to show how powerful video is.
I miss racing my GT-R. I guess that's what happens when you blow something up.
What a stressful day. I love setting up email messages that never go out to my customers after I thought they had.
We're Now LIVE And Taking Orders: http://www.trafficsecrets.com/only1000.html
Had a valuable phone conversation with @1938media last night. Were talking about the challenges ppl face just to be 'heard' in Social Media
